memberdef.name: CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const bool result = ARG; \ if( ! result ) { \ ::Error( "TauAnalysisToolsExample", "Failed to execute: \"%s\"", \ #ARG ); \ return 1; \ } \ } while( false )

memberdef.name: RETRIEVE
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (xEvent.contains<TYPE>(NAME)) \ CHECK( xEvent.retrieve( CONTAINER, NAME ) ); \ else \ Warning("TauAnalysisToolsExample","%s container is not available", NAME); \ } while(false) \
